definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]

sentences.english: There is a TV set, a stereo system and a number of chairs in the sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏有一臺電視機，一套組合音響和一些椅子。

sentences.english: We need backup singers. Who can sing?
sentences.chinese: 我們需要合音誰會唱歌？

sentences.english: Jim - guitar, keyboards, piano and vocals.
sentences.chinese: 負責彈吉他，鍵盤，鋼琴及合音。

sentences.english: You will be amazed that such a complex harmony came from an ancient tribe.
sentences.chinese: 你會驚訝於如此繁複的合音是來自一個古老的部落。

sentences.english: The music centre with original conception affords you happiness and vigour.
sentences.chinese: 構思新穎組合音響，帶給您快樂與活力。

definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
falsetto, same as 假聲|假声
pre-Tang names of the five notes of the pentatonic scale, corresponding roughly to do, re, mi, sol, la
to make a sound effect/sound effect/(historical linguistics) to reconstruct the sound system of an archaic language

five notes of pentatonic scale, roughly do, re, mi, sol, la/five classes of initial consonants of Chinese phonetics, namely: 喉音[hou2 yin1], 牙音[ya2 yin1], 舌音[she2 yin1], 齒音|齿音[chi3 yin1], 唇音[chun2 yin1]
